body_html:
Although master compiles, with commit fb5cc630f6f4cbdebde08e0e82a9679431afa9d2

One minor point - unless the tegra linux kernel is built enabling swap, it will run out of memory. To resolve this I used:
sudo MAX_JOBS=1 python3 setup.py install
body_text:

One minor point - unless the tegra linux kernel is built enabling swap, it will run out of memory. To resolve this I used:
sudo MAX_JOBS=1 python3 setup.py install
body:
Although master compiles, with commit `fb5cc630f6f4cbdebde08e0e82a9679431afa9d2`

One minor point - unless the tegra linux kernel is built enabling swap, it will run out of memory. To resolve this I used:
`sudo MAX_JOBS=1 python3 setup.py install`
